title: Lost Love: A Story of Love, insecurities and friendship.
description: In the fourth book in this series we will find out what happens to Krista, Theo and their friends next. Can their relationship be saved or is the damage done by Josie that severe that it is no longer salvageable? What will happen with Josie now that she has realised that she may have made a major mistake? Will she be able to save her relationship with her brother and with her friend Krista? And what will happen to Ronald? Will he be able to save his friendship with Theo? It promises to be an exciting time for all of them as we follow Krista and Theoâ€™s journey through despair, depression and self-doubt to hopefully come through stronger on the other side.
author: Joni Martins
